title: The Sound Healing Collection
author: David Ison; Jeffrey Thompson; Joseph Nagler; Silvia Nakkach; Steven Halpern
description: Music touches our hearts and resonates within our bodies. The right music can truly renew us, helping us to heal, relax, and revitalize. Great musicians have always recognized this therapeutic power of music, and scientific research is finally proving them right. The Sound Healing Collection brings together leading pio
